# Sprint Plan - Sprint 1 (2 weeks)

Objective: Scaffold backend + DB + GenerateMenu (AI) + core endpoints + minimal frontend to generate and view menus + basic order flow.

Capacity: ~60h

Selected tickets (IDs): H-B-01, H-B-02, H-B-03, H-B-04, H-B-05, H-F-01, H-F-02, H-B-06/H-F-03

WIP limit: 2

Ceremonies: Planning (1h), Daily (10m note), Review (30-45m), Retro (30m)

Definition of Done (DoD): code builds, lint passes, tests for critical use-cases, endpoints documented, PR merged.
